full_description: there is a hammer and a block on the table, use the arm to <grab the hammer> and <beat the block> repeatedly
schema: {A} notifies the hammer, {a} notifies the arm to grab the hammer
preference: num of words should not exceed 15
seen: Pick {A} and strike the block [num] times.
